name: Big Fishy!
description:
BIG FISHY! Made for Coding Blocks Game Jam 2021 JAM LINK

Heavily based on the classic flash game Fishy!


Theme: Everything is Broken

my game satisfies the theme because you are eating every single fish until the entire Eco system is broken.

Controls:

WASD or arrow keys to move

you can also use touch controls. simply tap where you want your fish to go!

Let me know what you think in the comments!Credit:Fish

Music

Eating Sounds

Bubbles

Background
